#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

How to set your configuration.properties file


= Parameters =

*inputQueue*=The path to the scanned images with subdirectories named same as documentTypes

*imageServer.internal*=Whether the internal imageserver is used (values: false, true)
_[default: false]_

*imageServer.url*=The URL of a imageserver (if is any imageserver used)

*imageServer.known*=The path to the image server directory where data with known sysno is stored (if is any imageserver used)

*imageServer.unknown*=The path to image server directory where data with unknown sysno is stored (if is any imageserver used)

*djatoka.home*=The scan Djatoka home path

*editor.home*=The editor home path

*imageExtension*=The allowed image extensions (values: jpg, JPG, png, tiff, tif, jpeg, jp2, pdf) _[default: jpg, png, tiff, tif, jpeg]_

*documentTypes*=Types of objects being digitalized (values: monograph, periodical, map, manuscript) _[default: periodical, monograph]_

*guishowInputQueue*=Whether the input queue has to be shown(values: false, true) _[default: true]_

*recentlyModifiedNumber*=The number of shown recently modified item _[default: 10]_

*z39.50Profile*=The z39.50 profile _[default: mzk]_

*z39.50Host*=The host(s) of z39.50 providers _[default: aleph.mzk.cz, aleph.muni.cz, sigma.nkp.cz, sigma.nkp.cz]_

*z39.50Port*=The used port(s) of z39.50 _[default: 9991, 9991, 9909, 9909]_

*z39.50Base*=The z39.50 base(s) _[default: MZK01-UTF, MUB01, SKC, NKC]_

*barcodeLength*=The lenght(s) of barcode _[default: 10, 10, 10, 10]_

*oaiUrls*=The URL(s) of OAI provider _[default: http://oai.mzk.cz]_

*oaiIdPrefixes*=The ID-prefixes of OAI _[default: oai:aleph.mzk.cz]_

*oaiBases*=The OAI base(s) _[default: MZK01, MZK03]_

*accessUserPatterns*= _[default: {{{*}}}]_

*accessAdminPatterns*= _[default: 127.{{{*}}}||localhost]_

*krameriusHost*=The kramerius host

*krameriusLogin*=The kramerius login

*krameriusPassword*=The kramerius password

*fedoraHost*=The fedora host

*fedoraLogin*=The fedora login _[default: fedoraAdmin]_

*fedoraPassword*=The fedora password

*fedoraVersion*=The fedora version _[default: 3.3]_

*httpBasicPass NOT SUPPORTED

*dbHost*=The database host _[default: localhost]_

*dbPort*=The database port _[default: 5432]_

*dbLogin*=The database login _[default: meditor]_

*dbPassword*=The database password

*dbName*=The database name _[default: meditor]_

*sshUser*=The user for accessing the machine via ssh _[default: meditor]_

*openIdApiKey*=The openId API key (of Janrain service) _[default: 775a3d3ec29deeeaf39e506ff514f39fcb5e434d]_

*openIdApiUrl*=The openId API URL (of Janrain service) _[default: https://rpxnow.com]_

*localhost*=Whether is this machine for developing (when the application is ran via hosted mode) _[default: false]_

*userDirectories*=The path to the stored user copies of FOXML or other user things

*genImagesLifetime*=The number of days after which will be the generated (converted) images removed

*akkaConvertWorkers NOT SUPPORTED

*akkaOn NOT SUPPORTED _[default: false]_

*createIngestInfoXmlFile NOT SUPPORTED

*imagesDir*=The path to the directory where converted images will be stored _[default: ~/output/]_

*identities  NOT SUPPORTED YET
